modName: Alternate start - Davyd - A level 1 Nord
summary: An alternate save where you\'re not a Dragonborn, But a nord from Solstheim, Travelling to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
==========
[B]Description[/b]
==========
As stated before, You\'re just a simple traveller from Solstheim, This means no main quest. You can read the Story to understand more about Davyd, Although unnecessary, I just love writting random stories.
=============
[b]Essential Mods[/b]
=============
You need the mods below, Seriously, Or Davyd will explode

Skyrim Redone by T3nd0
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286

Character Creation Overhaul 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21587
NOTE (You\'ll understand what i meant after you install the mod above): I choosed Combat as the main class, But this character is supposed to be a thief.
Basic skills choosen: Sneak, Speechcraft, Pickpocket, Light armor, One handed, and Archery.
I also put the book A New Beginning inside the end table beside you in case you wanted to change his look or repick the base skills.

=====================
[b]Installation Instruction[/b]
=====================
Open \"My Documents\" ---> \"My Games\" ---> \"Skyrim\" ---> \"Saves\" and put the file there

======
[B]Story[/b]
======
My name is Davyd, I was raised in Solstheim, Morrowind and i am 24 years old. About 3 months ago, After the death of my grandmother, My sister Vilja went to Skyrim on an odd quest with a bottle given from her grandmother. Thus days passes, We usually speak to each other by letters. After 2 months, I\'m starting to ponder, Now that i am a mature person, I should go seek my fortune, Maybe i should go to Skyrim and maybe search for my sister whilst seeking my fortune. The very next day i went down to the city\'s dock after saying goodbye to my parents and joined a trip to Skyrim by a ship named Red Wave heading to Solitude, A city in Skyrim. Alas the trip took a pretty while, And i\'m running out of gold, Considering i wouldn\'t be able to travel anywhere without gold, That very day i learned to pick people\'s pocket and stealing food unseen, Days passes, And i even fed my self more than enough! I found this method is pretty profitting, Although i think i should steal from the rich instead of making the poor more miserable. 2 days later i\'ve finally arrived to my destination. According to the letter i recieved from Vilja, She was in an inn called Bannered Mare in Whiterun, I should head there after i disembark the ship... And maybe steal a guard\'s equipment  before heading there, As my family isn\'t rich, Hence i came to Skyrim without even a spare clothes.

==================
[b]Recommended Mods[/b]
==================

Vilja in Skyrim (Companion mod)- Yeah, The story idea is based on her, And you can actually pretend to be her brother.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26393
Binocular vision for NPCs while sneaking
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8719
Requirements to join the Thieves Guild
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14157
Diseased - Makes diseases... Some sorta more challenging
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27780
No requirements to buy breezehome - Since the main quest is disabled, You\'ll need this if you wanna live in breezehome
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19055

Note: In case you wanted to start the main quest, Open up console by pressing the \"~\" button and enter this: setstage MQ102 30

P.S, This is my first upload, If i made a mistake please inform me about it and have mercy and don\'t eat me!
author: kr4pz
